content.text: Match ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Southampton 1.
Second Half ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Southampton 1.
Gaëtan Bong (Brighton and Hove Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Gaëtan Bong (Brighton and Hove Albion).
Shane Long (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Gaëtan Bong.
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Solly March replaces José Izquierdo.
Substitution, Southampton. Pierre-Emile Højbjerg replaces James Ward-Prowse.
Substitution, Southampton. Shane Long replaces Dusan Tadic.
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Isaiah Brown replaces Pascal Groß.

Goal!  Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Southampton 1. Glenn Murray (Brighton and Hove Albion) header from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Pascal Groß with a cross.
